response.overview: In an environment filled with mystery and suspense, five students - the Heads - face a macabre international plot: the sinister Doctor I.Q. intends to subjugate humanity to his evil designs by administering a dangerous drug to the youth! And this drug is already being experimented on students from the best schools in São Paulo. Miguel, the leader and idealizer of the most read about group of adolescents in Brazil, must take the lead in this electrifying fight! This is a job for the Heads: the inverse of the old, the opposite of the nerds!
response.title: The Obedience Drug
